official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide coverage for the services of optometrists related to the treatment of aphakia.

summary.text: Amends Title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide payment for the services of optometrists related to the treatment of aphakia under the supplementary medical insurance program.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide coverage for the services of optometrists related to the treatment of aphakia.
